plugin.name: pretty-numbers
plugin.author: Ryan Nickell
plugin.title: Pretty Numbers Plugin
plugin.description: Formats large numbers into non-standard notation to reduce the number of characters used to represent a number. For example, 12555 formats to 12.6K, providing a predictable maximum width of characters. The maximum value that the formatting gets applied is Trillions. K - Thousand M - Million B - Billion T - Trillion
